title: Manchin Outlines New BBB Plan
itunes:title: Manchin Outlines New BBB Plan
description:
Bloomberg Government's Jack Fitzpatrick and Emily Wilkins hosted the show. Guests: Democratic Congressman John Yarmuth of Kentucky, Laura Davison, Bloomberg Tax and Congress reporter, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
